model.entities.staticEntity

Class OfficeEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.entities.Entity
      • model.entities.staticEntity.StaticEntity
        • model.entities.staticEntity.CollidableEntity
          • model.entities.staticEntity.OfficeEntity

  • public class OfficeEntity
extends CollidableEntity
    Implementation of a collidable entity which has a scaled collision hit box.

    Again, this is some what pointless. These classes would have been much more useful if more time had been put into collision detection.

    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949
